objects.specification: A wide rectangular floor surface covered with a light grey vinyl or linoleum material. The surface has a matte finish with subtle texture to prevent slippage, suitable for a classroom environment. It provides a neutral base that complements the light-colored walls.

An interior wall panel painted in a light cream color. The surface is smooth and matte, providing a bright and neutral backdrop that enhances natural and artificial lighting. The edges are cleanly finished.

An interior wall panel painted in a light cream color. The surface is smooth and matte, providing a bright and neutral backdrop that enhances natural and artificial lighting. The edges are cleanly finished.

An interior wall panel painted in a light cream color. The surface is smooth and matte, providing a bright and neutral backdrop that enhances natural and artificial lighting. The edges are cleanly finished.

An interior wall panel painted in a light cream color. The surface is smooth and matte, providing a bright and neutral backdrop that enhances natural and artificial lighting. The edges are cleanly finished.

A single-panel flush interior door finished in a pale wood tone. The design features a minimalistic metal handle on the side, with a smooth surface and subtle wood grain texture. It blends seamlessly with the light walls.

A low wooden platform with a matching dark wood finish. The platform has a slightly raised edge trim and a smooth planed surface, designed to elevate the teacher's desk by a small amount. The wood shows fine grain patterns and a warm finish.

A sturdy rectangular teacher's desk made from a darker wood with a polished finish. It features a thick tabletop with visible wood grain, beveled edges, and solid legs. The desk has a professional, high-quality appearance.

A comfortable high-back chair with padded seat and backrest upholstered in dark neutral fabric. The frame is constructed from dark wood or metal with armrests, providing ergonomic support and a professional look.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white marker surface and a thin silver aluminum frame. The surface is smooth for easy writing and erasing, and the frame has clean lines.

A compact ceiling-mounted digital projector with a white plastic housing. It has ventilation grilles on the sides, a central lens on the front, and a small mounting bracket. The design is functional and modern.

A rectangular window with clear glass panels, framed by a thin aluminum profile. Horizontal adjustable blinds in neutral white cover the window, allowing control of natural light, and the glass has a slight blue tint.

A tall multi-shelf bookshelf constructed from medium-dark wood. The shelves are filled with books of varied colors and sizes, as well as educational materials like binders and decorative objects. The wood shows fine grain details.
A circular wall clock with a white face, bold black hour markers, and slender black hands. The clock has a thin metal bezel in a brushed steel finish, offering a modern yet understated look.
A glossy educational poster mounted on a thin frame. The poster features vibrant graphics and text related to academic subjects, printed on high-quality paper for durability and color clarity.
A glossy educational poster mounted on a thin frame. The poster features vibrant graphics and text related to academic subjects, printed on high-quality paper for durability and color clarity.

A low-profile square LED panel light with a diffused white surface and a slim metal frame. The fixture provides even, bright illumination and flush mounts to the ceiling.

A decorative potted plant with a slender trunk and lush green leaves. It is planted in a terracotta-style ceramic pot, adding a natural touch and color contrast to the room.
A simple cylindrical plastic waste bin in neutral grey with an open-top design. The surface is smooth matte plastic, suitable for everyday disposal of classroom waste.
A simple cylindrical plastic waste bin in neutral grey with an open-top design. The surface is smooth matte plastic, suitable for everyday disposal of classroom waste.
A single student desk with a rectangular warm wood top and slender tapered legs. The tabletop has a smooth matte finish showcasing subtle wood grain, with a small storage shelf underneath.
